Quisque commodo dui eget urna commodo, ut tempus felis rhoncus.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][pm_ln_piechart bar_size="220" line_width="12" percentage="75" caption="Body Fat Lost" font_size="40"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" parallax="content-moving" parallax_image="842" el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-80 pm-containerPadding-bottom-80 pm-center"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Button

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Display vital information with powerful infographics

item.title: Carousels and Posts
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Slider Carousel

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]Insert as many slides as you wish into the slider carousel. The slider carousel is powered by the free Flexslider plug-in. Easily switch between slide and fade mode with the integrated shortcode parameters.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_slider_carousel][pm_ln_slider_carousel_item el_title="Slide 1" el_image="803"][pm_ln_slider_carousel_item el_title="Slide 2" el_image="806"][pm_ln_slider_carousel_item el_title="Slide 3" el_image="809"][/pm_ln_slider_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Classes Carousel

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]Display scheduled classes with the classesCarousel shortcode. Past scheduled classes get automatically filtered out so customers are always viewing the next upcoming scheduled class.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_classes_carousel][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

News Posts

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]Display news posts anywhere throughout your page. Display up to a maximum of 3 posts and control the order in which they appear using the shortcode parameters.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_post_items][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Staff Profile

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]Display staff member profiles anywhere throughout your page with the staffProfile shortcode. Choose which member profile to display by simply passing in the post id into the id parameter.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_staff_profile id="286" name_color="#3f3f3f" title_color="#3f3f3f"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Panels Carousel

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]The panels carousel is great for interactive presentations and you can insert as many panels as you wish through the Redux framework.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_panels_carousel el_target="_blank"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Client Carousel

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]The client carousel is great for displaying client logos or brand logos. In our demo we are displaying several fitness brands and each logo in the carousel is fully interactive.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_client_carousel el_target="_self"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80"][vc_column width="1/4"][vc_column_text]

Event Posts

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#f6d600" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="20"][vc_column_text]Display events anywhere throughout your page with the eventItems shortcode. Past events get automatically filtered out so customers are always viewing the next upcoming event.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="3/4"][pm_ln_event_posts num_of_posts="3"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Testimonials
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-100"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Testimonial Profiles

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#cecece" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="10" divider_style="diamond"][vc_column_text]

Display individual testimonials with the testimonialProfile shortcode. This shortcode allows you to pass in all the essential parameters required for a successful testimonial to appear.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-bottom-80 pm-containerPadding-top-40"][vc_column width="1/3"][pm_ln_testimonial_profile name="dave johnson" title="Electrical Engineer" date="June 2016" image="973"]

 “Eum cu tantas legere complectitur, hinc utamur ea eam. Eum patrioque mnesarchum eu, diam erant convenire et vis. Et essent evertitur sea.”

[/pm_ln_testimonial_profile][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][pm_ln_testimonial_profile name="nicole cadby" title="Graphic designer" date="September 2016" image="976"]

 “Eum cu tantas legere complectitur, hinc utamur ea eam. Eum patrioque mnesarchum eu, diam erant convenire et vis. Et essent evertitur sea.”

[/pm_ln_testimonial_profile][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][pm_ln_testimonial_profile name="mike stanton" title="College Professor" date="December 2016" image="979"]

 “Eum cu tantas legere complectitur, hinc utamur ea eam. Eum patrioque mnesarchum eu, diam erant convenire et vis. Et essent evertitur sea.”

[/pm_ln_testimonial_profile][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Testimonial Carousel

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#cecece" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="10" divider_style="diamond"][vc_column_text]

Use the testimonials shortcode to display a beautiful interactive testimonial carousel. You can insert as many testimonials as you wish through the Redux options framework.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" el_class="pm-containerMargin60 testimonials pm-show-overflow" css=".vc_custom_1481402185577{background-image: url(http://wp.microthemes.ca/energy/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/testimonials-bg.jpg?id=842) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column][pm_ln_testimonials][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class="pm-containerPadding-top-100 pm-containerPadding-bottom-40"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Quote Box

[/vc_column_text][pm_ln_content_divider height="1" width="80" bg_color="#cecece" margin_top="20" margin_bottom="10" divider_style="diamond"][vc_column_text]

Display customer quotes with the quoteBox shortcode. Inset all the neccessary information required to display a successful quote with the given shortcode parameters.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/2"][pm_ln_quote_box author_name="Jane Tolman" author_title="Visual Designer, Academix Systems" avatar="1141"]Energy fitness is simply amazing - friendly staff, knowledgeable trainers and a great workout facility. Truly a triple AAA fitness studio.[/pm_ln_quote_box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][pm_ln_quote_box author_name="John Doe" author_title="Software Developer, Microsoft Inc." avatar="1144"]Energy Fitness helped get in the best shape of my life. There nutritional guidance and personal training programs are second to none![/pm_ln_quote_box][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.content:encoded:

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Karen,My first choice would be to hold on to a berabll in a squat rack that is about chest high. My second choice would be to set a cable pulley machine about chest high and hang on to the handles. If you feel comfortable doing so, you could also do them without hanging on to anything.

item.title: Silver Membership Plan
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: Our Silver membership plan is our most cost efficient plan that we offer. If you're budget conscious than is the perfect plan for you.

item.title: Bronze Membership Plan
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: Our Bronze plan is the next step up from the Silver plan and additionally it offers 2 free personal training sessions to whet your training appetite.

item.title: Gold Membership Plan
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: Our Gold plan is by far our most popular plan to date - it simply offers a great value at a reasonable rate.

item.title: Platinum membership plan
item.dc:creator: pmedia
item.content:encoded: Our platinum plan is great for the fitness enthusiast. Not only do you get full access to everything but it also includes 10 personal training sessions.
